sections.summary: i am clearly a loyal and friendly dedicated individual who has an ambition to succeed in any given environment. although i have extensive experience in the perishable meats and seafood industry. i love to learn, and am always up to a challenge whatever the situation. i get along well with others, whilst also working efficiently on my own. i am seeking a position where i can develop and excel while giving my best to an employer.
